page.title: 19FAMILY LIFE - LISA
page.content: I'm 9 years old and I go to Godshill Primary School. My hobbies are Horse Rangers, music and games, and I am in the Church Choir. I have a brother named Jason who is 5 years and he goes to Godshill School too. My Mum used to be a Manageress in a Hairdressing Salon, but now she is a housewife. She enjoys swimming, squash and yoga. My Dad works for the Electricity Board and his hobbies are sport, and Natural and Local History. We live in a 300 year old cottage. We have a pet rabbit called Snowy. As a family we enjoy walking, swimming and playing games. We have an automatic washing machine, a television, a vacuum cleaner, a computer, a tape recorder. Our car is a Ford Escort which is one year old. My Mum is Secretary to my school's Parent Teacher Association.
